mapper.insert: insert into account (accountID, account.name, mailbox, account.password, nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, account.identity) values (#{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mailbox,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{individualitySignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update account set account.name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, mailbox = #{mailbox,jdbcType=CHAR}, account.password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=CHAR}, individualitySignature = #{individualitySignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account.identity = #{identity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where accountID = #{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select accountID, account.name, mailbox, account.password, nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, account.identity from account where accountID = #{accountID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select accountID, account.name, mailbox, account.password, nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, account.identity from account
select accountID, account.name, mailbox, account.password, nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, account.identity from account where account.name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}
select accountID, account.name, mailbox, account.password, nickname, mobilePhone, sex, avatar, individualitySignature, account.identity from account where mailbox = #{mailbox,jdbcType=CHAR}
